mission.title: Continuum Mission
mission.description: Use Immortalized Crew to ensure the Continuum stays on the correct path. (Placeholder)

potential_rewards.name: Quantum Energy
potential_rewards.flavor: Quantum--a mortal term for Q energy--is needed in order to retrieve crew. Quantum will regenerate over time, but the Q can only hold so much at a time. Plan your crew retrieval operations in order to make efficient use of this resource. Quantum can be regenerated instantly in exchange for Dilithium.

potential_rewards.name: Dilithium
potential_rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

potential_rewards.name: Legendary Behold
potential_rewards.flavor: A valuable item. Go to the Honor Hall to collect!

quests.name: Incompatible With Life
quests.description: A group of Benzite officers are in danger after they were transported via temporal anomaly onto an NX-class ship. Help the crew ensure their survival!

reward.name: Medicine Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Top Marks
quests.description: The Stargazer is trapped in the Hekaras Corridor, where it will damage surrounding space at warp. Find a way to preserve both ship and space!

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

reward.name: Engineering Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

quests.name: The Professor's Deadline
quests.description: The self-aware Professor hologram has activated himself on your ship's holodeck, and is attempting to release other holograms. He must be stopped!

reward.name: Command Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.

quests.name: Rabid Fans
quests.description: Morn is attempting to establish a vole fighting ring in Ferengi space, unwittingly spreading a virulent strain of Simperian rabies. Shut it down.

stages.text: Stop Morn from Spreading Infected Voles

reward.name: Diplomacy Seminar Holoprogram Quipment
reward.flavor: It can never hurt to brush up on the basics.
